text: @SenSchumer May 5th and you and other Democrats in NY are doing nothing to stem the spread of Coronavirus across the state from illegals and migrant workers coming in from the southern border, not quarantining and going to work on farms in Northern NY. 170 new cases in a week all traced!!!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
